trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets an index for iterating over the set of process threads.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index value of the thread in the collection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Appends a process thread to the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index of the thread in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified process thread exists in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the thread exists in the collection; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The location at which to add the new instances.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides the location of a specified thread within the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Inserts a process thread at the specified location in the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The zero-based index indicating the location at which to insert the thread.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Deletes a process thread from the collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.
